brief_description: Seeking experienced vendor to migrate our legacy banking application to AWS cloud using microservices architecture. Includes containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, CI/CD implementation, and comprehensive staff training.

tender_title: LEED Gold Certified Office Building Construction
brief_description: Construction of 50,000 sq ft commercial office building with LEED Gold certification. Must include 150kW solar installation, rainwater harvesting, energy-efficient HVAC systems, and sustainable materials.
Pan India cybersecurity audit and penetration testing for banking network with 200+ branches. Comprehensive security assessment, compliance review, and remediation roadmap required.
Build comprehensive analytics platform for retail chain across multiple states. Requirements include sales forecasting, inventory optimization, and real-time dashboards.

tender_title: Pan India Hospital Medical Equipment Supply
brief_description: 3-year contract for medical equipment supply and cold chain logistics for hospital network across India. Requires FDA compliance, 99.5% on-time delivery, RFID tracking, and 24/7 emergency supply capability.

tender_title: Industrial Safety Equipment for Construction Sites
brief_description: Supply of 500 ISI marked safety helmets, 200 safety jackets, 300 pairs safety shoes, and 50 fire extinguishers for construction sites across Maharashtra and Gujarat.

tender_title: Smart Farming IoT Solution for Agricultural Land
brief_description: Implement precision farming solution for 5000 acre agricultural land across Punjab, Haryana and UP. Includes soil sensors, weather stations, drone surveys, and irrigation automation.
Design, installation and 5-year maintenance of 11KV electrical substation for manufacturing facility in Tamil Nadu. Must comply with CEA regulations.
